title: ensure binary artifacts contain the necessary licensing files
description: Lucene src pack contains SNOWBALL-LICENSE.txt which is not in either of the two binary packages, is this a problem?

comments.content:
In my opinion this was an actual problem (although, its been like this forever).

really this licensing stuff should be in LICENSE.txt/NOTICE.txt not some arbitrarily-named files.
